summary: A celebrity chef exacts revenge on a food blogger who torpedoes his career.
cast: James Le Gros|Joshua Leonard|Amy Seimetz|Larry Fessenden|Megan Hilty|John Speredakos|Mario Batali|Tobias Campbell|Owen Campbell|Lisa Golub|Andrea Kennedy|Sean Reid|Adam Bertocci|Jessie Coleman|Paula El Sherif|Allie Nelson|Graham Reznick|Roger Brenner
title: Bitter Feast
